**Build graphs with AI!**

This is your canvas. Work with an AI chatbot to visualize any topic.

Let's get you started! ‚¨áÔ∏è

**Step 1: Set Up Side-by-Side**

Open your AI chatbot (ChatGPT, Claude, Grok) in another window or tab.

Drag to resize so you see both:
- This graph editor on one side
- Your chatbot on the other

Makes copy/paste super easy!

**Step 2: Quick Setup**

1. Click the üìã button (top-left toolbar)
2. Paste into your AI chat

This teaches the AI how to make graphs for you!

**Step 3: Get Creative**

Ask your AI:
*"Create a graph about [YOUR TOPIC]"*

Examples:
- "My morning routine"
- "Solar system planets"
- "How pizza is made"

The AI replies with JSON!

**Step 4: See It Come Alive**

1. Copy JSON from your AI
2. Paste here (Ctrl+V)
3. Watch your graph appear!

Drag, edit, refine‚Äîrepeat!
